title: Eli Lilly's Olympics campaign rewind: Leverage pandemic's focus on health to assert its brand and assert its point of view
author: Beth Snyder Bulik
description: When Eli Lilly signed on to be an Olympic sponsor for the Tokyo Games in 2019, the pandemic was of course yet to come. | Eli Lilly signed on to be an Olympic sponsor for the Tokyo Games in 2019. When the pandemic postponed the Games, the pharma industry dove into researching vaccines and therapies and attention dropped for the Games and planning. But as successful vaccines and monoclonal antibody treatments came to market, Lina Polimeni, Lilly's chief media officer, noticed consumers were suddenly picking and choosing pharma brands.
